column5: As some of you have noticed my boat is for sale http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=19622 .  I am in the process of looking for a new boat.  I need something with a lot of storage.  So far I have it down to a few, with a Lund 1600 Explorer taking the lead.  My local marina has Ultracraft boats.  I know nothing about them and am wondering if anyone here has an opinion of them?
